event.description: Charlie Blackmon pops out to shortstop Orlando Arcia.
DJ LeMahieu grounds out, third baseman Travis Shaw to first baseman Eric Thames.
Carlos Gonzalez strikes out swinging.
Nolan Arenado hit by pitch.
Trevor Story strikes out swinging.
Gerardo Parra strikes out swinging.
Mark Reynolds homers (1) on a line drive to left center field. Nolan Arenado scores.
Tony Wolters strikes out swinging.
Jon Gray grounds out, shortstop Orlando Arcia to first baseman Eric Thames.
Charlie Blackmon reaches on a throwing error by catcher Jett Bandy.
DJ LeMahieu grounds out, shortstop Orlando Arcia to second baseman Jonathan Villar to first baseman Eric Thames. Charlie Blackmon to 2nd.
With Carlos Gonzalez batting, Junior Guerra picks off Charlie Blackmon at 2nd on throw to Orlando Arcia.
Pitching Change: Tommy Milone replaces Junior Guerra, batting 9th.
Milwaukee Brewers pitcher Junior Guerra left the game due to an injured leg.
Carlos Gonzalez called out on strikes.
Nolan Arenado singles on a fly ball to right fielder Domingo Santana.
Trevor Story doubles (1) on a line drive to left fielder Ryan Braun. Nolan Arenado to 3rd.
Gerardo Parra singles on a sharp line drive to center fielder Keon Broxton. Nolan Arenado scores. Trevor Story to 3rd.
Mark Reynolds grounds into a force out, shortstop Orlando Arcia to second baseman Jonathan Villar. Trevor Story scores. Gerardo Parra out at 2nd. Mark Reynolds to 1st.
Tony Wolters grounds into a force out, fielded by shortstop Orlando Arcia. Mark Reynolds out at 2nd.
Jon Gray pops out to second baseman Jonathan Villar.
Charlie Blackmon strikes out swinging.
DJ LeMahieu grounds out, shortstop Orlando Arcia to first baseman Eric Thames.
Pitching Change: Carlos Torres replaces Tommy Milone, batting 9th, replacing Jesus Aguilar.
Carlos Gonzalez grounds out softly, pitcher Carlos Torres to first baseman Eric Thames.
Nolan Arenado singles on a fly ball to center fielder Keon Broxton.
Trevor Story grounds into a double play, third baseman Travis Shaw to second baseman Jonathan Villar to first baseman Eric Thames. Nolan Arenado out at 2nd.
Pitching Change: Jhan Marinez replaces Carlos Torres, batting 9th, replacing Kirk Nieuwenhuis.
Gerardo Parra singles on a bunt ground ball to pitcher Jhan Marinez.
Mark Reynolds doubles (1) on a line drive to left fielder Ryan Braun. Gerardo Parra out at home on the throw, left fielder Ryan Braun to shortstop Orlando Arcia to catcher Jett Bandy.
Tony Wolters singles on a sharp line drive to right fielder Domingo Santana. Mark Reynolds to 3rd.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Stephen Cardullo replaces Carlos Estevez.
Stephen Cardullo walks. Tony Wolters to 2nd.
Pitching Change: Corey Knebel replaces Jhan Marinez, batting 9th.
Charlie Blackmon grounds into a force out, shortstop Orlando Arcia to second baseman Jonathan Villar. Mark Reynolds scores. Tony Wolters to 3rd. Stephen Cardullo out at 2nd. Charlie Blackmon to 1st.
With DJ LeMahieu batting, Charlie Blackmon steals (1) 2nd base, Tony Wolters scores. Throwing error by catcher Jett Bandy.
DJ LeMahieu called out on strikes.
Pitching Change: Jacob Barnes replaces Corey Knebel, batting 9th.
Carlos Gonzalez strikes out swinging.
Nolan Arenado grounds out, first baseman Eric Thames to pitcher Jacob Barnes.
Trevor Story grounds out softly, catcher Jett Bandy to first baseman Eric Thames.
Pitching Change: Jared Hughes replaces Jacob Barnes, batting 9th, replacing Hernan Perez.
Gerardo Parra grounds out, second baseman Jonathan Villar to first baseman Eric Thames.
Mark Reynolds walks.
With Tony Wolters batting, Mark Reynolds caught stealing 2nd base, catcher Jett Bandy to shortstop Orlando Arcia.
Tony Wolters singles on a ground ball to second baseman Jonathan Villar, deflected by pitcher Jared Hughes. Tony Wolters advances to 2nd, on a throwing error by second baseman Jonathan Villar.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Alexi Amarista replaces Adam Ottavino.
Alexi Amarista doubles (1) on a fly ball to left fielder Ryan Braun. Tony Wolters scores.
Charlie Blackmon grounds out, shortstop Orlando Arcia to first baseman Eric Thames.
Jonathan Villar called out on strikes.
Eric Thames called out on strikes.
Ryan Braun flies out to right fielder Carlos Gonzalez.
Travis Shaw doubles (1) on a sharp ground ball to left fielder Gerardo Parra.
Domingo Santana grounds out, shortstop Trevor Story to first baseman Mark Reynolds. Travis Shaw to 3rd.
Keon Broxton strikes out swinging.
Jett Bandy strikes out swinging.
Orlando Arcia singles on a line drive to center fielder Charlie Blackmon.
Junior Guerra out on a sacrifice bunt to first baseman Mark Reynolds. Orlando Arcia to 2nd.
Jonathan Villar strikes out swinging.
Eric Thames walks.
Ryan Braun strikes out swinging.
Travis Shaw called out on strikes.
Domingo Santana grounds out, third baseman Nolan Arenado to first baseman Mark Reynolds.
Keon Broxton grounds out, second baseman DJ LeMahieu to first baseman Mark Reynolds.
Jett Bandy singles on a line drive to center fielder Charlie Blackmon.
Orlando Arcia walks. Jett Bandy to 2nd.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Jesus Aguilar replaces Tommy Milone.
Jesus Aguilar singles on a line drive to left fielder Gerardo Parra. Jett Bandy to 3rd. Orlando Arcia to 2nd.
Jonathan Villar doubles (1) on a sharp line drive to center fielder Charlie Blackmon. Jett Bandy scores. Orlando Arcia scores. Jesus Aguilar to 3rd.
Eric Thames doubles (1) on a sharp line drive to right fielder Carlos Gonzalez. Jesus Aguilar scores. Jonathan Villar scores.
Pitching Change: Scott Oberg replaces Jon Gray, batting 9th.
Ryan Braun strikes out swinging.
Travis Shaw doubles (2) on a sharp ground ball to center fielder Charlie Blackmon. Eric Thames scores.
Domingo Santana hit by pitch.
Keon Broxton grounds into a force out, shortstop Trevor Story to second baseman DJ LeMahieu. Travis Shaw to 3rd. Domingo Santana out at 2nd. Keon Broxton to 1st.
Jett Bandy grounds out to first baseman Mark Reynolds.
Pitching Change: Carlos Estevez replaces Scott Oberg, batting 9th.
Orlando Arcia pops out to first baseman Mark Reynolds.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Kirk Nieuwenhuis replaces Carlos Torres.
Kirk Nieuwenhuis flies out to center fielder Charlie Blackmon.
Jonathan Villar strikes out swinging.
Pitching Change: Mike Dunn replaces Carlos Estevez, batting 9th, replacing Stephen Cardullo.
Eric Thames strikes out swinging.
Ryan Braun walks.
Travis Shaw strikes out on a foul tip and Ryan Braun caught stealing 2nd, catcher Tony Wolters to shortstop Trevor Story.
Pitching Change: Adam Ottavino replaces Mike Dunn, batting 9th.
Domingo Santana walks.
Keon Broxton walks. Domingo Santana to 2nd.
With Jett Bandy batting, Domingo Santana steals (1) 3rd base. Keon Broxton steals (1) 2nd base.
Jett Bandy called out on strikes.
Orlando Arcia strikes out swinging.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Hernan Perez replaces Jacob Barnes.
Hernan Perez strikes out swinging.
Pitching Change: Greg Holland replaces Adam Ottavino, batting 9th, replacing Alexi Amarista.
Jonathan Villar walks.
Eric Thames lines out to center fielder Charlie Blackmon.

Brewers challenged (play at 1st), call on the field was upheld: Ryan Braun grounds into a double play, third baseman Nolan Arenado to second baseman DJ LeMahieu to first baseman Mark Reynolds. Jonathan Villar out at 2nd.
